div.p: General attribute, required in a number of children of control, that provides controlled terminology related to the management of an EAD instance. The terms available for value are defined in closed lists that vary by element as follows:
Values in eventtype: created, revised, deleted, cancelled, derived, updated, unknown
Values in agenttype: human, machine, unknown
Values in publicationstatus: inprocess, approved, published
Values in maintenancestatus: revised, deleted, new, deletedsplit, deletedmerged, deletedreplaced, cancelled, derived
